comments.author: Chris Male
comments.body:
Patch which fixes indentation, moves over to Java 5 loops, cleans up some comparisons, and leaves a TODO in TermsFilter for future work.

Tests pass.  Ready to go.

comments.author: Simon Willnauer
comments.body:
bq. Tests pass. Ready to go.
+1

description: Before moving some of the classes from the queries contrib to the queries module, I want to just pass over them and clean them up, since we want code in modules to be of the same calibre as core code.
